text:
The current Watchdog site is dated, this isn't a "bug" per se, but you'll notice
that the list of Jakarta components doesn't reflect recent changes to the
structure of the ASF.

Also, Watchdog is somewhat dormant.  It might be wise to put some sort of status
message telling people what the plan is and where to go for assistance.  This
issue was raised during a discussion on general@jakarta
creator: tobrien@discursive.com
